CustomField.description: This field is optional and can be collected as part of a workflow. It provides a description of the alternate text to print under a signature line for the beneficiary. This is used if something other than the beneficiary's name should be printed under their signature line.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A description of the alternate text to print under a signature line for the beneficiary. This would be used if something other than the beneficiary's name should print under their signature line.
CustomField.label: Alternate Signature Description
